header: Here in England, two long weeks of school holiday ending today. It is Monday bank holiday in England today. From tomorrow, back to school run in the morning and afternoon whilst fasting as it is Ramadan going on.
Let's enjoy the last day of the break and not worry about anything else.

In the last one week or so, I have been sharing Perl sample code post on various social platforms, like The Perl Community, Perl Programmers, Twitter and LinkedIn. It has generated lots of buzz on the subject. Lots of new ideas, at least to me, came to the front.
For those who missed it, let me share some of them here.
Have fun with Perl and share your experience with us. You take care of yourself and your loved one.
subject: Perl Rocks
